headline: A Look At United Airlines (UAL) Valuation After Record Results And Upbeat 2026 Outlook
summary: United Airlines Holdings (UAL) just reported its highest ever quarterly and full year revenues, with earnings and sales above analyst estimates, and paired those results with an upbeat 2026 outlook alongside large fleet investment plans. See our latest analysis for United Airlines Holdings. The strong earnings and upbeat 2026 outlook have come after a solid run, with the share price delivering an 8.49% 90 day return but easing recently, while the 3 year total shareholder return of 121.10%...

headline: Why United Airlines (UAL) Is Down 5.1% After Record 2025 Results And Aggressive 2026 Expansion Plans
summary: United Airlines Holdings, Inc. has already reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, posting record quarterly revenue of US$15,397 million and full-year revenue of US$59,070 million, with higher net income and diluted EPS than the prior year. Management credited strong premium and loyalty revenue growth, record passenger volumes, and operational reliability, while outlining ambitious 2026 plans including more than 100 new narrowbody jets, about 20 Boeing 787s, and major airport...
